short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables users to search the University of Illinois' Easy Search with a right-click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why buy books and articles we already own? Highlight text - article title, author names, DOI, or journal - on a page, right-click, and search with the University of Illinois' Easy Search!

Version 2.2.
Fixed a typo
